  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DBManager, HsqlDBManager, MsSqlDBManager, MySqlDBManager, OracleDBManager, PostgresDBManager

      • replaceObjectInRelation

        <T extends IGeoObject> void replaceObjectInRelation(java.lang.String pRelationName,
                                                  T pGeoObject)
                             throws DBManagerException
        replaces an existing GeoObject in a relation (table) by a new one. The new GeoObject has to have the same ID as the old one.
        Parameters:
        pRelationName - relationName name of the relation (table)
        pGeoObject - GeoObject to replace
        Throws:
        DBManagerException

      • search

        <T extends IGeoObject> Search<T> search(SearchType pSearchType,
                                      GeoData pGeoData,
                                      org.apache.ws.jaxme.sqls.SelectStatement pStmt)
                                    throws SearchException,
                                           DBManagerException
        Searches the database for IGeoObjects in the specified way.
        Parameters:
        pSearchType - SearchType
        pGeoData - GeoData used as the spatial condition of the query
        pStmt - SelectStatement
        Returns:
        gao.core.Search object than can be used to retrieve IGeoObjects
        Throws:
        SearchException
        DBManagerException

      • search

        <T extends IGeoObject> java.util.Vector<T> search(SearchType pSearchType,
                                                GeoData pGeoData,
                                                org.apache.ws.jaxme.sqls.SelectStatement pStmt,
                                                int pMaxCandidates)
                                              throws SearchException,
                                                     DBManagerException
        Deprecated. Use the other search instead.
        Searches the database for GeoObjects. Any search which is more complicated than the search for a GeoObject which is identified by its ID is located here.
        Parameters:
        pSearchType - Search-Type, defined in SearchType
        pGeoData - GeoData as "geo-condition" of the query
        pStmt - SelectStatement for any other (non-geo) conditions
        pMaxCandidates - How many candidates are possible while searching. A big number of candidates need a long time for the JTS-checking. If there are more candidates than allowed an exception will be thrown. 0 => no limit
        Returns:
        Vector of Instances of IGeoObjects
        Throws:
        SearchException
        DBManagerException
